pages.text: Harnessing the forces of creation, the crafting altar allows mages to work miracles of magic. This is where you will create all of your spells.

The altar is upgradeable by two groups, the caps and the structure materials. Both groups stack cumulatively, so for example wooden planks (1) plus glass (1) equals a power of two, while sandstone (2) plus diamond blocks (7) equals a power of nine. The higher the power, the more powerful spells can be crafted.
